full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Integrated Security System, Artifact Storage Facility
## Announcement Details
* **Tender Reference No.**: cb-141-46471858
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation No.**: 5P300-23-0112/A
* **Publishing Date**: October 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Goods/Services Required**: Design, supply, install, commission, integrate, warrant, and support of a new Integrated Security System for the Artifact Storage Facility located in Gatineau, QC
* **Security Requirement**: Personnel security clearance required, mandatory fingerprints for new requests
## Submission Guidelines
* **Submission Method**: Email to [soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca), or fax to 1-877-588-2349
* **File Size Limitation**: 15 MB
* **Required Documents**: Vendors must obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities)
## Optional Site Visit
* **Date and Time**: October 20, 2023, at 9:30 AM EST
* **Location**: 555 Avenue des Entreprises, Gatineau, QC J8R 2X5
* **Pre-Registration**: Please confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of attendees by October 19, 2023, at 12:59 PM EST
## Support and Documentation
* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either English or French
* **Contact Information**: Christine Lajoie, Contracting Authority, (343) 585-2762, christine.lajoie@pc.gc.ca
## Additional Information

Please note that the security requirements of Parks Canada require new personnel security clearance requests to include mandatory fingerprints. Bidders must be pre-qualified and have a valid Supply Arrangement at the time of bid solicitation.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Late submissions will not be considered. For additional information or clarification, please contact the Contracting Authority. The Procurement category for this tender is SRVTGD, and the notice type is RFP against Supply Arrangement.
